channel.title: Python News
channel.description: Python-related news and announcements. Python is an interpreted, interactive, object-oriented programming language.

item.title: Python 3.2 alpha 2 released
item.description: The second alpha release of Python 3.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Python 2.6.6 released
item.description: Python 2.6.6 final has been released.

item.title: Python 2.6.6rc2 released
item.description: A second release candidate for Python 2.6.6 has been released for testing. Python 2.6.6 final is schedule for release on August 24, 2010.

item.title: Python 2.6.6rc1 released
item.description: A release candidate for Python 2.6.6 has been released for testing. Python 2.6.6 final is schedule for release on August 16, 2010.

item.title: Python 3.2 alpha 1 released
item.description: The first alpha release of Python 3.2 has been released for testing.

item.title: Frank Willison Award goes to Christian Tismer
item.description: Christian Tismer has been selected as the recipient for the 2010 Frank Willison Memorial Award for contributions to the Python community. Congratulations!

item.title: Python track at German Zope conference
item.description: The German Zope Conference takes place September 15-17 in Dresden. We are still looking for talk proposals for the Python track.

item.title: Python 2.7 released
item.description: The first production version of Python 2.7 has been released.

item.title: PSF supports PyCon India
item.description: The PSF is sponsoring PyCon India 2010, to be held in Bangalore on Sep 25/26, 2010. The PSF is contributing an amount of $1000 towards the conference and wishes PyCon India all success.

item.title: Python 2.7 release candidate 2 released
item.description: The second release candidate of Python 2.7 has been released for testing.

item.title: PyCon India 2010 Call for Proposals
item.description: Submit your proposal by July 31 for PyCon India (Bangalore, Sept 25-26)

item.title: Python 2.7 release candidate 1 released
item.description: The first release candidate of Python 2.7 has been released for testing.

item.title: EuroPython 2010 Talks Schedule Announced
item.description: The conference schedule for EuroPython 2010 (Monday July 19th until Thursday July 22nd) has now been made available, along with a convenient list of talks

item.title: PyCon Australia program
item.description: Check out the program and register for PyCon Australia 2010, held Saturday 26th June and Sunday 27th June in Sydney, Australia.

item.title: SciPy 2010 in Austin, Texas
item.description: Scientific computing conference comprised of tutorials, a general conference, keynote talks from David Beazley and Travis Oliphant, commercial tracks, and developer sprints. June 28 - July 3 on the University of Texas campus. See the conference website for details.

item.title: Python 2.7 beta 2 released
item.description: The second beta of Python 2.7 has been released for testing.

item.title: PyCon Australia Call for Proposals
item.description: Talk submissions are now being accepted for PyCon Australia 2010, held Saturday 26th June and Sunday 27th June in Sydney, Australia.

item.title: Python 2.7 beta 1 released
item.description: The first beta of Python 2.7 has been released for testing.

item.title: Google Summer of Code: call for participation
item.description: Python is participating in the Google Summer of Code, and we welcome mentors and students! Please see the Python Summer of Code site for more details on how to participate.

item.title: EuroScipy call for papers
item.description: Abstract submission is now open for EuroScipy 2010, the 3rd European meeting on Python in Science. The conference will be held at the Ecole Normale Superieure, in Paris, July 8-11 2010.

item.title: Python 3.1.2 released
item.description: The second bug fix release for the Python 3.1 series is now available.

item.title: Python 2.6.5 final
item.description: The final release for Python 2.6.5 is now available.

item.title: Python 2.6.5 release candidate 2
item.description: The second release candidate for Python 2.6.5 is now available.

item.title: Python 2.7 alpha 4 released
item.description: The fourth alpha of Python 2.7 is now available for download.

item.title: Python 3.1.2rc1 released
item.description: A release candidate of Python 3.1.2 is now available for download.
